content.raw: with the latest changes that check the original sdf version, I can load `worlds/pr2.world`, but if I click to insert a PR2 into a simulation using gzclient, it doesn't work, because [gazebo::gui::ModelMaker calls sdf::readFile](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a72fc496e1952f11dca3c69edfc5b221b7c8544e/gazebo/gui/ModelMaker.cc#lines-114), which up-converts to 1.7, then sends that sdf string to `~/factory`. Perhaps we could use `sdf::convertFile` instead of `sdf::readFile` to try to keep it at its original version?
content.html: with the latest changes that check the original sdf version, I can load worlds/pr2.world, but if I click to insert a PR2 into a simulation using gzclient, it doesn't work, because gazebo::gui::ModelMaker calls sdf::readFile, which up-converts to 1.7, then sends that sdf string to ~/factory. Perhaps we could use sdf::convertFile instead of sdf::readFile to try to keep it at its original version?
